item.title: New Dornakal-Gadwal rail line in the works, to give fillip to multiple sectors
item.description: <![CDATA[Hyderabad: People of south Telangana will soon have railway connectivity to Delhi, thanks to a proposed new rail line linking Dornakal and Gadwal. Apart from benefiting people of Nalgonda, Suryapet, Nagarkurnool, Wanaparthy, and Gadwal districts, the proposed line will be a shorter route for transportation of coal from Singareni Collieries to thermal plants in Karnataka and Maharashtra.The rail link would also provide people access not only to New Delhi but also to Tamil Nadu and Kerala. In fact...]]>
